fields.question: What payment methods do you accept?
fields.answer: We currently only accept secure card payments processed through Stripe. No other payment methods are supported at this time.

fields.question: What is your return policy?
fields.answer: You can return shoes within 14 days of delivery, as long as they are unworn, in their original packaging, and in resellable condition.

fields.question: Can I exchange shoes for a different size or color?
fields.answer: Exchanges are currently not available. You can return the item within 14 days and place a new order for the preferred size or color.

fields.question: Can I track my order?
fields.answer: At the moment, tracking is not available. You will receive a confirmation email once your order has been shipped.

fields.question: Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
fields.answer: Please contact our support team immediately at support@sneakup.example.com. We may be able to help before the order is shipped.

fields.question: Do you offer live chat support?
fields.answer: Currently, we do not offer live chat. Please reach out to us via email at support@sneakup.example.com for assistance.

fields.question: Do you have a wishlist feature?
fields.answer: The wishlist feature is not yet available, but we're working on adding it in a future update.

fields.question: Do you offer any discounts or promotions?
fields.answer: We currently do not offer discounts or promotions. Our goal is to keep prices fair for all customers at all times.

fields.question: How do I start a return?
fields.answer: Email returns@sneakup.example.com with your order number and reason for return. We’ll guide you through the process.

fields.question: What if I receive the wrong or damaged shoes?
fields.answer: If your order is incorrect or the shoes arrive damaged, contact us within 48 hours of delivery. We’ll assist with a return or replacement.
